codes.label: Unique alphanumeric identifier assigned to each study
Initials of the coder responsible for data extraction
Last names of the authors as listed in the publication
Year when the publication was published (numeric)
Language in which the publication is written (1=English; 2=Portuguese; 3=Spanish)
Type of parliaments covered in the study (1=National; 2=Sub-national; 3=Both; 98=Unclear)
Does the study focus primarily on attitudes/perceptions/opinions towards parliament? (1=Yes; 2=Partially; 3=No; 98=Unclear)
Research questions as stated by the authors
Forms of citizen behavior toward parliaments examined in the study (Multiple selection)
Attitudes and evaluations of citizens toward parliaments examined in the study (Multiple selection)
Definitions of main concepts as framed by authors
Country or countries where study was conducted
Research techniques used to collect data (Multiple selection)
Brief summary of main findings relevant to citizens' attitudes or views of parliaments
Additional comments, coding difficulties, or points of clarification
codes.evidence: Article text not provided in query; only references section visible

codes.label: Year when publication was published
codes.evidence: Appears to be doctoral dissertation with 2017 context based on latest references cited through 2016

codes.label: Thesis
codes.evidence: Tese de Doutoramento em Ciência Política de Tiago Tibúrcio

codes.label: Empirical
codes.evidence: inquérito aos peticionários portugueses (inédito na sua abrangência)

codes.label: Both national and sub-national
codes.evidence: análise dos sistemas de petição de vários parlamentos da União Europeia (mais Escócia e Parlamento Europeu)

codes.label: Yes
codes.evidence: avaliação dos peticionários sobre o sistema de petições

codes.label: Petitioning
codes.evidence: Petições (e-petições), direito de petição perante o Parlamento

codes.label: Trust/confidence in parliament
codes.evidence: confiança nas instituições políticas, avaliação da experiência de apresentar uma petição

codes.label: Comparative
codes.evidence: análise do caso português contextualizando-o com o sistema de petições-E da Escócia e Alemanha

codes.label: Surveys
codes.evidence: inquérito aos peticionários portugueses (inédito na sua abrangência), realizado entre 1999 e 2012

codes.label: Primary
codes.evidence: inquérito realizado aos peticionários, recolha de dados de todas as petições

codes.label: Quantitative and qualitative
codes.evidence: análise quantitativa baseada no inquérito; análise qualitativa do enquadramento normativo
